name: COVERAGE_5
description: The COVERAGE_5 table contains high-level information on both managed care and indemnity coverage records in your system.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the coverage record.

columns.name: COBA_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The Coordination of Benefits Agreement (COBA) status for E01 file generation.

columns.name: COBA_DELETE_EFF_DATE
columns.description: When the Coordination of Benefits Agreement (COBA) status in COBA_STATUS_C is DELETE or ADD+DELETE, this holds the effective date that is to be marked as deleted on the E01 file.
